Posts.Content: May 26, 2014 10:20AM Itsawordnotasentence wrote: Wrenn Thanks so much for your reply.... Advice that I plan to utilize.... Going to set up an appointment for second opinion next week! I did question his skills but did not want to overreact either....validating to hear that I'm not! Thanks again and best wishes to you as well!
Posts.Title: Frustrated and undecided!! Itsawordnotasentence Lakegirl1

Posts.Content: May 24, 2014 09:02PM Itsawordnotasentence wrote: Lakegirl1, I cannot thank you enough for your response and willingness to share your most intimate experience....it really does help! I plan to meet with my surgeon next week and start to make the arrangements for the double mastectomy.....I think it will be the only way I can get some sense of peace of mind.  The other factor that is leaning me towards the mastectomy is that I have Rheumatoid arthritis which will only continue to be more of a problem down the road as I continue to age.... I'm 45 and have a rather aggressive form of it that despite being treated for the last 8 years, remains uncontrolled.  Thanks again and best of luck to you! I will keep you in my thoughts and prayers!
